org.apache.ignite.ml.knn.ann

Class ANNClassificationTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.DatasetTrainer<M,Double>
      • org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.SingleLabelDatasetTrainer<ANNClassificationModel>
        • org.apache.ignite.ml.knn.ann.ANNClassificationTrainer

  • public class ANNClassificationTrainer
extends SingleLabelDatasetTrainer<ANNClassificationModel>
    ANN algorithm trainer to solve multi-class classification task. This trainer is based on ACD strategy and KMeans clustering algorithm to find centroids.
